# Copilot instructions

## Context
Investment portfolio analysis tool for processing German tax/broker export data. Primary data source is CSV exports with German column headers containing transaction history, gains/losses, and tax calculations.

## Stack
Python, sqlite, streamlit, uv

## Rules
- Implement only the requested features. If the request is ambiguous, ask for clarification instead of making assumptions.
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
- Follow Python best practices and PEP 8 style guidelines.
- Use Powershell for any scripting tasks.
- Ensure compatibility with Windows OS.
